participant_2.background:
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i regularly go to the gym.
i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.
I'd like to live in the suburbs so I can have a bigger home and a yard for my pets.
i used to fly planes for a living.

content.text: I am doing well! Just finished college and have a new job as a teacher.
Oh wow! congratulations! What grade will you be teaching?
I will be teaching high school!
Oh nice! I bet that will be a lot of fun. I am currently a student in business administration.
That's a good major! What do you want to do when you graduate?
I want to work in the corporate world and eventually start my own business.
Oh that's a great goal! I wish you the best of luck!
Thank you! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the gym and spend time with my pets.
Oh that's nice! I love to go to the gym too. I also like to play video games.
Oh video games are fun! I used to play a lot when I was younger.
Me too! I still play them sometimes. What was your favorite video game?
I loved playing Mario Kart and Sonic the Hedgehog.
Oh those are both great games! I love them too.
